title: Day in the Life of an IL Dairy Farmer #shorts

subtasks: Beginning the day with fresh milk
Guiding milking process for 12 cows at a time (6 on each side)
Ensuring cow teats are clean before milking
Cooling milk in bulk tank for future pickup
Providing extra care to Gloria's red baby calf
Starting milking process again in the evening (around 4 p.m.)
Pouring milk from a container into a glass
Drinking fresh milk upon waking at 4 a.m.
Caring for mother cows (milking and cleaning)
